postContent: We're almost there! It's almost time to cross the finish line and to graduate from the University of Minnesota Bootcamp. Honestly I never saw this day approaching so fast...
I'm so excited! I just learned about the AI chat and the capabilities it has to create code. Some may fear this but I am intrigued... thoughts?
I'm so excited! I just learned about the AI chat and the capabilities it has to create code. Some may fear this but I am intrigued... thoughts?
Has anyone tried using react native for mobile development...?
Will we have access to our coding materials and class materials after we graduate?
